title: [Lysierian Hills, Lake Marliese]
description: The water here is so clear, you can see through to the lakebed beneath.  Slender, light gray reeds push their way up from the rich soil, contrasting beautifully with dark gray stones, their surfaces polished smooth by time and tide.

The water here is so clear, you can see through to the lakebed beneath.  Slender green reeds push their way up from the rich soil, contrasting beautifully with brilliant blue stones, their surfaces polished smooth by time and tide.
The water here is clear.  Slender, light gray reeds push their way up from the rich soil, their surfaces polished smooth by time and tide.
